Belt Line Rd, Irving, TX, 75038', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 24', 'OR Text', '24', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'WELCOME HOME!', 'Watch our video here:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 674 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Located within walking distance of shops, restaurants, and businesses, Summer Gate places you in the heart of Irving.', 'Our newly renovated apartments are convenient to the Irving Mall, North Lake College, and DFW International Airport.', 'Summer Gate offers something for everyone including 1 & 2 bedroom apartments.', 'Enjoy our new amenities and get a sneak peek of the good life at Summer Gate Apartments.', 'Call to schedule a tour today.', 'Features', '- Wi-Fi', '- Hardwood-Style Flooring', '- Heating', '- New Kitchen Appliance Package', '- Washer/Dryer -', 'In Unit', '- Upgraded Hardware', '- High Speed Internet Access', '- Pantry', '- Storage Units', '- Microwave', '- Fireplace', '- Modern Interior Paint Finishes', '- Dishwasher', '- Designer Lighting', '- Two Inch Blinds', '- Security System', '- Trash Compactor', '- Air Conditioning', '- Disposal', '- Cable Ready', '- Washer/Dryer Hookup', '- Ice Maker', 'Community Amenities', '- Pool Lounge Seating', '- Lounge Areas', '- Valet Trash Services', '- Fitness Studio', '- New Online Services', '- Convenient Online Rent Payments', '- Clothes Care Center', '- Online Maintenance Requests', '- Leash-Free Dog Park', '- Sparkling Pool', '- Outdoor Kitchen', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Policy Type: Cat, Dog', 'Max Weight of Pets: 50', 'Pet Monthly Rent Min/Max: $25 - $50', 'Max Number of Pets: 2', 'Pet Deposit Min/Max: $87 - $175', 'Pet Policy: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'There is a $87.50 pet deposit (non-refundable) per pet.', 'Pet rent is $25 per month.', 'There is a weight limit of 50 pounds per pet, and aggressive breeds are prohibited.', 'Please call our Leasing Office for complete Pet Policy information.', 'Pet Rent Basis: Per Home', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday:1:00PM-5:00PM', '2XI2T7mWNWU']
